comment:
PRE-REVIEW COMPLETE. RESULT: COMPLIANT. RECOMMEND.

FRONTMATTER VERIFICATION:
- title: "Verification Record (VR) Document Type" -- present and non-empty
- revision_summary: "Initial draft" -- present; CR-reference not required for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1

STRUCTURE VERIFICATION (SOP-002 Section 6):
All 12 required sections present and correctly numbered:
1. Purpose, 2. Scope (2.1 Context, 2.2 Changes Summary, 2.3 Files Affected), 3. Current State, 4. Proposed State, 5. Change Description (5.1-5.6), 6. Justification, 7. Impact Assessment (7.1-7.5 including Development Controls and Qualified State Continuity), 8. Testing Summary (Automated and Integration), 9. Implementation Plan (Phases 1-8), 10. Execution (18 EIs with pre/post-execution commits per SOP-004 Section 5), 11. Execution Summary, 12. References.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK:
- TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX: None found
- {{...}} design-time placeholders: None found (all replaced)
- [...] execution-time placeholders: Present only in Sections 10-11 (correct)

TRACEABILITY:
- References SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005, SOP-006 (all EFFECTIVE)
- References CR-082 (precedent), CR-084 (driving requirement), Session-2026-02-16-004 (design origin)
- Parent Document: None (design-driven improvement) -- consistent with context

EI TABLE:
- 18 items (EI-01 through EI-18)
- Column structure matches TEMPLATE-CR (EI, Task Description, Execution Summary, Task Outcome, Performed By - Date)
- EI-01 is pre-execution commit, EI-18 is post-execution commit (SOP-004 Section 5 compliant)
- EI-02 through EI-17 map to Implementation Plan Phases 1-8

QUALIFIED STATE CONTINUITY (Section 7.5):
- Before CR: EFFECTIVE v14.0/v18.0, CLI-9.0
- During execution: Unchanged, DRAFT, CLI-9.0
- Post-approval: EFFECTIVE v15.0/v19.0, CLI-10.0
- All values are specific (no TBD placeholders)

FORMATTING: Consistent heading hierarchy, horizontal rules, bold/code/table formatting throughout.
TYPOS: None found.

No deficiencies identified. Document is procedurally compliant and technically well-structured.

POST-REVIEW VERIFICATION — CR-089 v1.2 (Verification Record Document Type)

Verified per SOP-002 Section 7.3, all six conditions:

CONDITION 1 — Execution Complete: PASS
All 18 execution items (EI-01 through EI-18) have Task Outcome of "Pass". No Fail outcomes. Verified by reading the EI table at lines 284-303 of CR-089-draft.md.

CONDITION 2 — Blocking VARs Resolved: PASS
Section 11 (Execution Summary) states: "No variances." Zero VARs exist under CR-089.

CONDITION 3 — Documentation Approved: PASS
All 10 controlled documents modified under CR-089 confirmed EFFECTIVE:
- SOP-001 v21.0 EFFECTIVE
- SOP-002 v13.0 EFFECTIVE
- SOP-004 v8.0 EFFECTIVE
- SOP-006 v5.0 EFFECTIVE
- TEMPLATE-VR v1.0 EFFECTIVE
- TEMPLATE-CR v8.0 EFFECTIVE
- TEMPLATE-VAR v3.0 EFFECTIVE
- TEMPLATE-ADD v2.0 EFFECTIVE
- SDLC-QMS-RS v15.0 EFFECTIVE
- SDLC-QMS-RTM v19.0 EFFECTIVE

CONDITION 4 — Evidence Documented: PASS
Each EI contains specific execution evidence in the Execution Summary column: commit hashes (EI-01: 15f7440, EI-04/05: 247d90e, EI-06/07: c79e2df, EI-09: 2c6b826/bb0cd27, EI-18: cc399ad), version numbers for approved documents, test counts (424 tests), and PR reference (PR #16).

CONDITION 5 — SDLC Prerequisites Met: PASS
RS v15.0 EFFECTIVE and RTM v19.0 EFFECTIVE confirmed via qms_status. RTM qualified baseline references commit c79e2df (actual hash, not placeholder).

CONDITION 6 — VRs Complete: PASS (vacuous)
CR-089 EI table does not contain a VR column. CR-089 was pre-approved before the VR column was introduced to TEMPLATE-CR. No EIs are flagged for VR. Condition is vacuously satisfied.

TRACEABILITY VERIFICATION:
revision_summary fields on all modified documents reference CR-089:
- SOP-001: "CR-089: Add VR (Verification Record) document type to Sections 2, 3, 6.1, 8.2"
- SOP-002: "CR-089: Simplify Section 6.8 to reference VRs as integration verification mechanism; add VR gate to Section 7.3 post-review requirements"
- SOP-004: "CR-089: Add VR to scope/definitions (Sections 2-3), VR column to EI table (Section 4.2), new Section 9C for VR lifecycle, VR gate in Section 10"
- SOP-006: "CR-089: Add Verification Record (VR) as third verification type in Sections 3, 6.2, 6.3, 7.3, 9"
- TEMPLATE-CR: "CR-089: Add VR column to EI table and update execution guidance"
- TEMPLATE-VAR: "CR-089: Add VR column to EI table guidance in resolution work section"
- TEMPLATE-ADD: "CR-089: Add VR column to EI table"
- SDLC-QMS-RS: "CR-089: Add VR document type — REQ-DOC-016 (parent state), REQ-DOC-017 (born IN_EXECUTION); update REQ-DOC-001, REQ-DOC-002, REQ-DOC-005, REQ-WF-003"
- SDLC-QMS-RTM: "CR-089: Add VR document type — REQ-DOC-016, REQ-DOC-017 test entries; qualified baseline updated to c79e2df (feature/vr-document-type branch, 424 tests)"
- TEMPLATE-VR: "Initial draft" — acceptable per SOP-002 Section 8 exemption for initial creation (v0.1, not driven by external CR)

DOCUMENT QUALITY:
- Frontmatter title: "Verification Record (VR) Document Type" — present and descriptive
- Frontmatter revision_summary: "Initial draft" — acceptable for executable document
- No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found
- Formatting consistent throughout
- Section numbering correct (1-12)
- All references valid

DETERMINATION: COMPLIANT. All six post-review conditions satisfied with evidence. Recommend for post-approval.
